title: Broken mess
text: There‚Äôs basically no point in going through and changing your notification settings cause they‚Äôll be reset once a new update rolls through. Idk how many times I‚Äôve had to go back and turn off multiple notifications settings just to have them magically turned back on a day later, and the ‚Äúrecommendation‚Äù notifications are by far the most annoying cus almost never recommend things I‚Äôd even remotely care about. Why are the comment sections so bad?? I mean seriously it‚Äôs laughably bad across the board, commenting on reels doesn‚Äôt work. The comment section takes up maybe 1/5 of the screen and doesn‚Äôt expand when you try to write your own, making for an extremely tedious experience when typing anything longer than three words. A comment will be posted on a video I shared but when I go to look at said comment I get taken to the original video where the comment doesn‚Äôt exist, so if I want to see what was commented I have to go to my profile and find the post just to read what my friend said. And on top of all that you have the ‚Äúmost relevant‚Äù feature which is unbelievably annoying, why isn‚Äôt there a setting where I can always view all comments? Having to change that everytime I go through a comment section is just tedious.

title: Thank you!
text: Thank you Facebook for providing this platform that enables us to innocence connect, communicate and care about people places and things! In the old millennium we wish we could clone ourselves like that Michael Keaton movie and an essence in his nanosecond world Facebook makes it possible as we can do this on the go anywhere, anytime with anyone! Thank you Facebook, the team the employees that are constantly updating this platform to make it better for us! After all this will become the archives for the future generation to look back on the history of what was relevant to us and our lives! Thank you again and have a happy and healthy Facebook day!

title: Hacked Account
text: I've had my original Facebook account since 2005. You had to be enrolled with a college email to even have Facebook back then. I recently got hacked and they've done absolutely nothing to help me recover it. To say I'm disappointed with Facebook is an understatement. I've created a new account and will continue to use it for marketplace and distant people communication, but that's it. No more memories and pictures will I entrust with Facebook.

title: Facebook help.
text: My account was hacked/stolen and I worked for almost a week trying to restore it. Someone was allowed to steal my picture and pretend they were me and change my password and I was logged out and could never get back on. I was finally able to get several messages from Facebook trying to tell me how to sign back in but I was never able to get on because they wanted me to log in from another device and I couldn‚Äôt get on it either. I even , upon their request, scanned my drivers license for them to prove I was who I said i was. After all that I still was not able to sign in. After several frustrating days and numerous attempts I had to start all over. Now, i have to start all over and sometimes Facebook isn‚Äôt allowing me to friend some of my family and friends because they say I don‚Äôt know them. One person was my own daughter in law. It makes no sense to me that my account was stolen and I wasn‚Äôt allowed to chat or given a phone number of someone to talk to so we could have resolved the issue without me having to start all over . I had several chats set up too with family members and those have to be recreated . Many of my friends and even family are reluctant to accept my friend request because they fear it is the hacker again. I‚Äôm just totally frustrated with the way Facebook handled this situation.

title: Reels are buggy

title: Censoring on Facebook
text: My biggest problem with Facebook is that of its automatic censoring of posts doesn‚Äôt seem to be done by live people, but by algorithms (?) that target certain buzzwords without regard to CONTEXT of how those words are used, as in a metaphorical or symbolic useage. I‚Äôm afraid to even use them right here, to give examples of exactly what I mean, but are we in the age of mega-rich social media corporate power that now seeks to tell us what we can say or think, by forbidding words and terms we can use to communicate those ideas, and believes people are so stupid that they cannot discern the *sense* and context? This is the start of a very dangerous path if that is the case, and I challenge Facebook to stop trying to control how we think on any given issue, and promote the open and true exchange of ideas for that is what keeps any people free from tyranny from any side of the powers that be!

title: FaceBook review
text:
Mostly fun, works 99 percent of the time. Like the new real time video feature. Not quite so fond of the "memories" posts showing up, if I wanted to post previous posts, I would. All in all, thanks for making it easier to keep in touch with friends, & relatives....( also making it easier to Find them!). ......not so fond of the feature that lets other people pretend to be my friends, there should be more of an identification process before someone is allowed to creat a page.
3/19  thanks for enabling me to get in touch w/ long list relatives and HighSchool friends‚Ä¶however, I can do w/o the constant barrage of memories‚Ä¶‚Ä¶like Facebook a lot!

title: Still has the same bugs and memory leaks from years ago!
text: They keep updating this crAPP but it still has the same problems!  Spend a little time browsing in Marketplace and it WILL eventually crash, it doesn‚Äôt matter how much memory your device has.  Sometimes when you open a photo, it doesn‚Äôt give you any way to close out of it and the only way you can get back to doing anything is to quit and re-launch the Facebook app.  Anytime somebody sends me a Facebook URL in Messenger, clicking it just launches the FB app, but it doesn‚Äôt go to the page in the link.  It just shows whatever page I viewed last.  There are a lot more bugs, but those are the main ones I can think of at the moment!
